name: eRALOS3
tag_list: solar, energy, cleantech, flexible, high-tech, photovoltaic, renewable-energy, smartphone, mp3-player, battery, charge
overview:
★ We want to make people energetically independents ★

eRALOS3 is an italian technology startup dedicated to innovation. We want to change the world thanks to our innovative technology behind flexible, lightweight and customizable photovoltaic cells, and thanks to our green products with innovative features and application ways. These features make our products ideal for application and integration on clothing, accessories (bags, backpacks, etc.) or any other thing that comes to mind, in order to recharge easily your small portable electronic devices like smartphones, mp3 players… your connectivity and green energy anytime and everywhere!

external_links.title: Bendable Photovoltaic Cells For On-The-Go Charging
